string-array.name: question2
string-array.item: 3. Which of the following is the main function of the command interpreter?
a. to handle the files in the operating system
b. to provide the interface between the API and application program
c. to get and execute the next user-specified command
c. to get and execute the next user-specified command

string-array.item: 5. The resource management can be done in an operating system via
b. both time and space division multiplexing
b. both time and space division multiplexing

string-array.item: 8. The command interpreter in The main function is

b. to provide the interface between the API and application program
